data.lyric:
[ti:when the party's over]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:when the party's over]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]when the party's over - Billie Eilish
[00:06.36]Lyrics by：Finneas O'Connell
[00:12.73]Composed by：Finneas O'Connell
[00:19.10]Don't you know I'm no good for you
[00:27.28]I've learned to lose you can't afford to
[00:36.33]Tore my shirt to stop you bleeding
[00:44.42]But nothing ever stops you leaving
[00:53.65]Quiet when I'm coming home I'm on my own
[01:00.72]I could lie and say I like it like that like it like that
[01:08.06]I could lie and say I like it like that like it like that
[01:18.21]Don't you know too much already
[01:26.11]I'll only hurt you if you let me
[01:35.31]Call me friend but keep me closer
[01:43.34]And I'll call you when the party's over
[01:52.60]Quiet when I'm coming home I'm on my own
[01:59.67]And I could lie and say I like it like that like it like that
[02:06.91]Yeah I could lie and say I like it like that like it like that
[02:13.92]But nothing is better sometimes
[02:20.06]Once we both said our goodbyes
[02:27.09]Let's just let it go
[02:32.81]Let me let you go
[02:41.97]Quiet when I'm coming home I'm on my own
[02:50.10]I could lie and say I like it like that like it like that
[02:58.77]I could lie and say I like it like that like it like that
data.trans:
[ti:when the party's over]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:when the party's over]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:06.36]//
[00:12.73]//
[00:19.10]难道你还不明白 我于你无益
[00:27.28]曾无法承受失去你 如今我已经学会接受
[00:36.33]撕毁我的衬衫 只想为你止血
[00:44.42]但什么都无法阻止你离开的脚步
[00:53.65]家只有我一个人的身影 悄无声息的安静
[01:00.72]我就这样骗自己 我喜欢一个人 喜欢安静
[01:08.06]我就这样骗自己 我喜欢一个人 喜欢安静
[01:18.21]难道你没意识到已经太多次了
[01:26.11]我怎会伤你分毫
[01:35.31]唤我普通朋友却将我紧拥入怀
[01:43.34]曲终人散时 我会告诉你
[01:52.60]家只有我一个人的身影 悄无声息的安静
[01:59.67]我就这样骗自己 我喜欢一个人 喜欢安静
[02:06.91]我就这样骗自己 我喜欢一个人 喜欢安静
[02:13.92]但一切不曾好转 有时候
[02:20.06]如果我们开口互道再见
[02:27.09]那让我们就这样放手吧
[02:32.81]让我放手 让你离去吧
[02:41.97]家只有我一个人的身影 悄无声息的安静
[02:50.10]我就这样骗自己 我喜欢一个人 喜欢安静
[02:58.77]我就这样骗自己 我喜欢一个人 喜欢安静
